problem.markdown:
>>Do you expect a long, slender column to fail in compression or by buckling?<< ( ) Compression (x) Buckling
[explanation] Explanation: A long, slender column is more likely to buckle. As the height increases the buckling load decreases and as the cross-section becomes smaller the moment of inertia decreases as does the buckling load. [explanation]
